attributes.action: allow the screening of the film Taking Liberties in Downing Street on the day of Tony Blair's departure on 27th June 2007
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The themes and stories raised in the film Taking Liberties cast doubt over so many of the decisions taken by Tony Blair and his government, specifically those concerning Iraq, the relationship between the US and UK, the "war against terror" and more generally those affecting the historic civil liberties the UK population have enjoyed for so long.

We the undersigned would like Tony Blair and all of those responsible for making these decisions to watch this film together and reflect on the consequences of their actions
